channel.title: Sushi on JonTheNerd
channel.description: Recent content in Sushi on JonTheNerd

item.title: Jon can cook...
item.description: Tonight I tried my hand at making one of my favorite eat-out foods. This is my second try…the first ended up in the trash can. And which roll did I make? The classic Americanized sushi - the California Roll. Where did I get my inspiration? Youtube videos. Search for “how to sushi rice” and “how to california roll” and enough instructions will appear that even the slowest of cooks…ahem…can figure it out.
